emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Autonomous Code Development
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems capable of autonomously writing, testing, and deploying code from high-level requirements.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces entry barriers for software development, changes job roles, increases software reliability.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Need for trust in AI, regulatory frameworks for AI in software development, integration with existing development tools.

emerging_technologies.name: Brain-Computer Interfaces for Learning
emerging_technologies.description: BCI devices that enhance learning capabilities by directly interfacing with human cognition to boost understanding and memory retention.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for educational equity, ethical concerns regarding cognitive enhancement, privacy of neural data.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological maturity, public acceptance, ethical and regulatory guidelines.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum-Enhanced Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: Quantum computing integration into blockchain for enhanced security and scalability, potentially making current encryption obsolete.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Increased security for digital transactions, need for new encryption standards, potential economic disruptions.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Availability of quantum computing resources, regulatory adaptation to quantum technology, industry acceptance.

emerging_technologies.name: Energy-Harvesting Nanomaterials
emerging_technologies.description: Materials capable of harvesting ambient energy to power small devices, reducing dependency on traditional energy sources.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Sustainability, reduction in battery waste, enabling widespread IoT deployment.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Cost-effectiveness, efficiency, integration into consumer products.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Powered Collaborative Development Environments
mainstream_technologies.description: Development environments where AI assistants facilitate real-time coding, debugging, and learning across teams.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in software companies, educational institutions, and open-source communities.

mainstream_technologies.name: Smart Autonomous Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Fully autonomous vehicles with AI systems handling all aspects of driving, integrated into smart cities.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard in urban and inter-city transportation, reshaping urban planning and logistics.

epoch_themes.description: The integration of AI into the core of software development and business processes.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Shift in workforce skills, new forms of employment, enhanced productivity, and creativity in development.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased demand for AI literacy, reshaping of educational curriculums, global competition in AI technology.

epoch_themes.description: Focus on creating environmentally sustainable urban environments through technology.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improved quality of life, reduced environmental impact, changes in urban infrastructure.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Urban planning with technology at its core, international cooperation for sustainable technologies.
